labels.Label_LED: The lamp uses an LED to give us light
labels.Label_Switch: Switch: allows us to turn the light on and off

problem.story: Julian needs to finish his homework. Unfortunately, his desk lamp has stopped working.

objectives.objective: Program a light that Julian can turn on and off.
objectives.reason: This will give Julian light to finish his homework. He can make it stay on as long as he needs.

objectives.objective: Program a light to stay on for 5 minutes so Julian can finish his homework.
objectives.reason: We don't know how long Julian will take to finish his homework. This light might turn off before he's finished!

objectives.objective: Don't program anything so Julian can skip his homework.
objectives.reason: This won't help Julian finish his homework!

algorithm.reason: We need to make sure the light isn't on first.

algorithm.step: Wait until the button is pressed.
algorithm.reason: We can't do that just yet.
Something needs to happen once the button is pressed.

algorithm.step: Wait until the button is pressed.
algorithm.reason: If we repeat now, the light will turn off as soon as it comes on.
